name: Phone Seller Simulator
description:
Dear players, we start as a character in the game, follow a close friend of our character and buy the place specified by him. And after you buy, you start buying phones from the computer and selling them to customers. And of course you can also improve your skills as the day goes on . Some of them now;
SELL PHONE
SELL MEMORY CARD
SELL COVER
SAT CAMERA
SELL BATTERIES
REPAIR
TRADE
It is . And of course, you will also have to go to the tax office building, which is in the game, from every phone you sell or make a transaction, and pay taxes. With the money you earn, you can improve your place, buy items and get an assistant assistant.
